pr_title: Add support for line break in array literal

timeline.message:
Add support for line break in array literal

Signed-off-by: Nipuna Marcus <nipunac@wso2.com>

timeline.bodyText: Can we merge if else blocks for CLOSING_BRACKET and CLOSING_PARENTHESIS as the two code blocks seems to be identical?
timeline.author: NipunaRanasinghe
